{{aside (page="wiki/syntax index")}}

Strike a line through text.

This is sometimes used to show the old version of text, which has now been superseded.

Its often used for comic effect to show what you really mean, but at the same time, include the politically correct version.

== Example ==

The queen is a --waste of space-- valuable asset.

{{{
The queen is a --waste of space-- valuable asset.
}}}
